physical_examinations.vital_signs: Normal vital signs and oxygen saturation
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Decreased breath sounds and dullness to percussion over both lung bases; multiple small telangiectasias (<5 mm in diameter) on the oropharyngeal mucosa and the skin of the hands, arms, and trunk.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: pH 7.36, pCO2 32 mm Hg, pO2 78 mm Hg
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: No significant abnormalities reported apart from the values provided.
Dramatic improvement in symptoms after drainage procedure.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Postoperative erythropoietin level fell from 4500 to 450 mIU/ml, then increased to over 4000 mIU/ml within a week.
